StSShapeShifter:FruitBasket.NAME: Fruit Basket
StSShapeShifter:FruitBasket.DESCRIPTION: Add !M! random Fruit to your hand.

StSShapeShifter:Flood.NAME: Flood
StSShapeShifter:Flood.DESCRIPTION: Destroy all minions. Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to all remaining enemies. Exhaust.
StSShapeShifter:Flood.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. Destroy all minions. Apply !M! Vulnerable and Weak to all remaining enemies. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:PoisonIvy.NAME: Poison Ivy
StSShapeShifter:PoisonIvy.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! poison to all enemies. Grow !StSShapeShifter:Grow!.

StSShapeShifter:DeepWound.NAME: Deep Wound
StSShapeShifter:DeepWound.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Whenever the target attacks, they take !M! damage.

StSShapeShifter:ShiftingStrike.NAME: Shifting Strike
StSShapeShifter:ShiftingStrike.DESCRIPTION: If your last card played was a form, this card costs 0. Deal !D! Damage.

StSShapeShifter:OakBlade.NAME: Oak Blade
StSShapeShifter:OakBlade.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Return a random card from your Discard Pile to your hand. Shuffle Oak Blade back into your Draw Pile

StSShapeShifter:Guard.NAME: Guard
StSShapeShifter:Guard.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Dexterity affects this card !M! times.

StSShapeShifter:Sapling.NAME: Sapling
StSShapeShifter:Sapling.DESCRIPTION: Swap this card with a card in your discard pile. Draw 1 card. Exhaust.
StSShapeShifter:Sapling.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap this card with a card in your discard pile. Draw 1 card.

StSShapeShifter:MagicMushrooms.NAME: Magical Mushrooms
StSShapeShifter:MagicMushrooms.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Randomize the cost of cards in your hand. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:Flourish.NAME: Flourish
StSShapeShifter:Flourish.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Reduce their costs by 1 this turn.
StSShapeShifter:Flourish.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. Reduce their cost to 0 this turn.

StSShapeShifter:SpiritOfTheEarth.NAME: Spirit of the Earth
StSShapeShifter:SpiritOfTheEarth.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a skill, Gain !M! block.

StSShapeShifter:Hunt.NAME: Hunt
StSShapeShifter:Hunt.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Gain !M! energy next turn.

StSShapeShifter:LeapingSlash.NAME: Leaping Slash
StSShapeShifter:LeapingSlash.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least 2 Dexterity. Deal !D! Damage.

StSShapeShifter:OpportuneSwoop.NAME: Opportune Swoop
StSShapeShifter:OpportuneSwoop.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if you have at least 5 cards in you Draw Pile and Discard Pile. Deal !D! Damage.

StSShapeShifter:Blossom2.NAME: Blossom
StSShapeShifter:Blossom2.DESCRIPTION: Simulate the Growth of all of your Grow cards !M! times.

StSShapeShifter:RestoreBalance.NAME: Restore Balance
StSShapeShifter:RestoreBalance.DESCRIPTION: Remove all buffs from an enemy. Excludes Boss-specific buffs. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:RitualOfTheElders.NAME: Ritual of the Elders
StSShapeShifter:RitualOfTheElders.DESCRIPTION: Lose 1 Dexterity and 1 Strength. Increase Max HP by !M!. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:RitualOfTheExtinct.NAME: Ritual of the Extinct
StSShapeShifter:RitualOfTheExtinct.DESCRIPTION: Deal Massive damage to an enemy. Decrease Max HP by !M!. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:Absorb.NAME: Absorb
StSShapeShifter:Absorb.DESCRIPTION: Copy a random buff from an enemy.

StSShapeShifter:Bonk.NAME: Bonk
StSShapeShifter:Bonk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Enter a random form.

StSShapeShifter:ThrashAbout.NAME: Thrash About
StSShapeShifter:ThrashAbout.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies 3 times. Lose 1 energy next turn.

StSShapeShifter:CursedApple.NAME: Cursed Apple
StSShapeShifter:CursedApple.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Wither !StSShapeShifter:Wither!. If this card is withered to 0, add a random Curse into your deck and exhaust this card.

StSShapeShifter:MultiSpiritedStrike.NAME: Multi-Spirited Strike
StSShapeShifter:MultiSpiritedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is equivalent to !M!X the number of unique forms played this combat.

StSShapeShifter:SkullBash.NAME: Skull Bash
StSShapeShifter:SkullBash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is equivalent half of your current hp.
StSShapeShifter:SkullBash.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is equivalent half of your Max HP.

StSShapeShifter:ReplenishingNectar.NAME: Replenishing Nectar
StSShapeShifter:ReplenishingNectar.DESCRIPTION: Heal for !M!. Increase this heal by 1 permanently. Exhaust.
StSShapeShifter:ReplenishingNectar.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal for !M!. Increase this heal by 2 permanently. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:Wildfire.NAME: Wildfire
StSShapeShifter:Wildfire.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. Wither !StSShapeShifter:Wither!.

StSShapeShifter:Wildfire2.NAME: Wildfire
StSShapeShifter:Wildfire2.DESCRIPTION: Apply Wildfire !M! to an enemy. That enemy takes !M! damage at the start of their turn, and then Wildfire jumps to a random enemy. This effect Withers by !StSShapeShifter:Wither! for each jump.

StSShapeShifter:Earthquake.NAME: Earthquake
StSShapeShifter:Earthquake.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. Wither !StSShapeShifter:Wither!.

StSShapeShifter:ForestFire.NAME: Forest Fire
StSShapeShifter:ForestFire.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand. Draw !M! cards. Upgrade your hand.

StSShapeShifter:Tornado.NAME: Tornado
StSShapeShifter:Tornado.DESCRIPTION: Swap your draw and discard piles. Retain. Exhaust.
StSShapeShifter:Tornado.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Swap your draw and discard piles. Retain.

StSShapeShifter:RockSlide.NAME: Rock Slide
StSShapeShifter:RockSlide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! to all enemies. If this is the first time this card is played this turn, return it to your hand. Grow !StSShapeShifter:Grow!.

StSShapeShifter:IntimidatingAura.NAME: Intimidating Aura
StSShapeShifter:IntimidatingAura.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! block for each Attack card in your hand.

StSShapeShifter:Pounce.NAME: Pounce
StSShapeShifter:Pounce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If your last card played was a form, apply !M! vulnerable.

StSShapeShifter:BurrBomb.NAME: Burr Bomb
StSShapeShifter:BurrBomb.DESCRIPTION: Apply a Burr Bomb to an enemy. At the end of your next turn, it explodes, dealing !M! damage. Grow !StSShapeShifter:Grow!.

StSShapeShifter:Tortoise_Form.NAME: Tortoise Form
StSShapeShifter:Tortoise_Form.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Tortoise Form, Gain !B! Block. While in Tortoise Form, gain !M! Dexterity

StSShapeShifter:Lynx_Form.NAME: Lynx Form
StSShapeShifter:Lynx_Form.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Lynx Form, Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. While in Lynx Form, gain !M! Strength

StSShapeShifter:RatForm.NAME: Rat Form
StSShapeShifter:RatForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Rat Form, Gain 1 Dodge and lose 1 Dexterity. While in Rat Form, apply !M! Poison to a random enemy at the end of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:OwlForm.NAME: Owl Form
StSShapeShifter:OwlForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Owl Form, Discover a Power card. While in Owl Form, draw 1 additional card each turn.

StSShapeShifter:PantherForm.NAME: Panther Form
StSShapeShifter:PantherForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Panther Form, your next attack or damaging Form deals double damage. While in Panther Form, gain !M! Strength at the end of your turn. Lasts 3 turns. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:WaspSwarmForm.NAME: Wasp Swarm Form
StSShapeShifter:WaspSwarmForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Wasp Swarm Form, Apply X Weak and Poison to all enemies. While in Wasp Swarm Form, deal 2X damage to all enemies at the start of your turn.
StSShapeShifter:WaspSwarmForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Wasp Swarm Form, Apply X+1 Weak and Poison to all enemies. While in Wasp Swarm Form, deal 2(X+1) damage to all enemies at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:HummingbirdForm.NAME: Hummingbird Form
StSShapeShifter:HummingbirdForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Hummingbird Form, upgrade a random card in your hand. While in Hummingbird Form, your Grow cards Grow for !M! additional when played.
StSShapeShifter:HummingbirdForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Hummingbird Form, upgrade two random cards in your hand. While in Hummingbird Form, your Grow cards Grow for !M! additional when played.

StSShapeShifter:BulwarkOfDiscovery.NAME: Bulwark of Discovery
StSShapeShifter:BulwarkOfDiscovery.DESCRIPTION: After playing this card, whenever you draw a unique card, gain !M! Block.
StSShapeShifter:BulwarkOfDiscovery.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. After playing this card, whenever you draw a unique card, gain 2 block.

StSShapeShifter:Evolution.NAME: Evolution
StSShapeShifter:Evolution.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, upgrade a random card in your deck.
StSShapeShifter:Evolution.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, upgrade !M! random cards in your deck.

StSShapeShifter:EagleForm.NAME: Eagle Form
StSShapeShifter:EagleForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Eagle Form, Discover an attack card. While in Eagle Form, at the start of your turn, apply !M! vulnerable to enemies who intend to attack

StSShapeShifter:PhoenixForm.NAME: Phoenix Form
StSShapeShifter:PhoenixForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Phoenix Form, Remove all debuffs. While in Phoenix Form, If you receive fatal damage, heal for !M!0 Percent of your health instead of dying.

StSShapeShifter:MooseForm.NAME: Moose Form
StSShapeShifter:MooseForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Moose Form, stun all enemies. While in Moose Form, return a card from your discard pile to your hand at the start of your turn. Exhaust.
StSShapeShifter:MooseForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Moose Form, stun all enemies. While in Moose Form, return !M! cards from your discard pile to your hand at the start of your turn. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:HippoForm.NAME: Hippo Form
StSShapeShifter:HippoForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Hippo Form, deal !D! damage to a random enemy. While in Hippo Form, at the start of your turn, discard a card and deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

StSShapeShifter:RaptorForm.NAME: Raptor Form
StSShapeShifter:RaptorForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Raptor Form, deal !D! to a random enemy !M! times. While in Raptor Form, Grow !StSShapeShifter:Grow!.

StSShapeShifter:RhinoCalfForm.NAME: Rhino Calf Form
StSShapeShifter:RhinoCalfForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Rhino Calf Form, gain !B! block. While in Rhino Calf Form, gain !M! Plated Armor at the end of your turn. This Grows by 1 each turn. After 3 turns, enter Rhino Form. Exhaust.
StSShapeShifter:RhinoCalfForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Rhino Calf Form, gain !B! block. While in Rhino Calf Form, gain !M! Plated Armor at the end of your turn. This Grows by 1 each turn. After 3 turns, enter Improved Rhino Form. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:PorcupineForm.NAME: Porcupine Form
StSShapeShifter:PorcupineForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Porcupine Form, Gain !M! Thorns. While in Porcupine Form, you are immune to Debuffs.

StSShapeShifter:FertileSoil.NAME: Fertile Soil
StSShapeShifter:FertileSoil.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are Blooming, draw 1 card and gain 1 energy.

StSShapeShifter:WiltingWrath.NAME: Wilting Wrath
StSShapeShifter:WiltingWrath.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are Wilting, your next attack deals double damage. If you are Decaying, also deal !D! Damage to all enemies

StSShapeShifter:EntForm.NAME: Ent Form
StSShapeShifter:EntForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Ent Form, Gain !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! Regen. While in Ent Form, gain Entangled at the start of your turn and gain !M! Dexterity at the end of your turn. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:DeerForm.NAME: Deer Form
StSShapeShifter:DeerForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Deer Form, Draw !M! card. While in Deer Form, add a random skill to your hand at the start of your turn.
StSShapeShifter:DeerForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Deer Form, Draw !M! cards. While in Deer Form, add a random skill to your hand at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:CosmicShifter.NAME: Cosmic Shifter
StSShapeShifter:CosmicShifter.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, deal damage to all enemies equal to the number of unique forms you have entered this combat.

StSShapeShifter:FlamingoForm.NAME: Flamingo Form
StSShapeShifter:FlamingoForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Flamingo Form, discover a Skill. While in Flamingo Form, remove a random debuff at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:BearForm.NAME: Bear Form
StSShapeShifter:BearForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Bear Form, Gain !B! Block and 1 Dexterity. While in Bear Form, gain !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! Block at the end of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:WolfForm.NAME: Wolf Form
StSShapeShifter:WolfForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Wolf Form, Gain !M! Strength. While in Wolf Form, your attacks heal you for !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic!.

StSShapeShifter:DragonForm.NAME: Dragon Form
StSShapeShifter:DragonForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Dragon Form, Deal !D! Damage and Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to all enemies. While in Dragon Form, deal !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! damage to all enemies and gain !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! Block at the start of your turn. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:LionForm.NAME: Lion Form
StSShapeShifter:LionForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Lion Form, gain !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! strength, then double your strength. While in Lion Form, Apply !M! Deep Wound to a random enemy. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:MonkeyForm.NAME: Monkey Form
StSShapeShifter:MonkeyForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Monkey Form, add a Banana to your hand. While in Monkey Form, whenever you play a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

StSShapeShifter:FoxForm.NAME: Fox Form
StSShapeShifter:FoxForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Fox Form, deal !D! to a random enemy. While in Fox Form, at the end of your turn, Dig for treasure, gaining gold and a small chance at gaining a relic. Lasts for up to 3 turns. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:SquirrelForm.NAME: Squirrel Form
StSShapeShifter:SquirrelForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Squirrel Form, add 2 Acorns to your hand. While in Squirrel Form, add an Acorn to your hand at the start of your turn.
StSShapeShifter:SquirrelForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Upon entering Squirrel Form, add 2 upgraded Acorns to your hand. While in Squirrel Form, add an upgraded Acorn to your hand at the start of your turn.

StSShapeShifter:HydraForm.NAME: Hydra Form
StSShapeShifter:HydraForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Hydra Form, Gain !M! Vulnerable. While in Hydra Form, deal triple damage. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:MammothForm.NAME: Mammoth Form
StSShapeShifter:MammothForm.DESCRIPTION: Upon Entering Mammoth, Gain !B! Block. While in Mammoth Form, whenever you receive damage, take !M! less damage. Lasts up to 3 turns. Exhaust

StSShapeShifter:Rest.NAME: Rest
StSShapeShifter:Rest.DESCRIPTION: Exit your form. You may not enter a new form this turn. Gain !B! Block.

StSShapeShifter:Sap_Burst.NAME: Sap Burst
StSShapeShifter:Sap_Burst.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, reduce a random enemy's strength by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:DiverseSpirit.NAME: Diverse Spirit
StSShapeShifter:DiverseSpirit.DESCRIPTION: After playing this card, whenever you play a unique form this combat, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card.

StSShapeShifter:PowerShifter.NAME: Power Shifter
StSShapeShifter:PowerShifter.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a form, gain !M! Strength

StSShapeShifter:Ensconce.NAME: Ensconce
StSShapeShifter:Ensconce.DESCRIPTION: If you haven't changed forms this turn, increase the value of your current form by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:BaskInBloom.NAME: Bask in Bloom
StSShapeShifter:BaskInBloom.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are Blooming, increase all cards in your deck's Grow value by !M!. If you are Blossoming, also draw a card.

StSShapeShifter:Harmony.NAME: Harmony
StSShapeShifter:Harmony.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are Balanced, gain 1 Strength or 1 Dexterity at random.

StSShapeShifter:Synchronicity.NAME: Synchronicity
StSShapeShifter:Synchronicity.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Grow card, gain 1 Dexterity. Whenever you play a Wither card, gain 1 Strength.

StSShapeShifter:WolfsBane.NAME: Wolf's Bane
StSShapeShifter:WolfsBane.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Grow card, apply !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! Poison to a random enemy. This effect Grows by 1. Whenever you play a Wither card, apply !M! Poison to a random enemy. This effect Withers by !StSShapeShifter:Wither!.
StSShapeShifter:WolfsBane.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Grow card, apply !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! Poison to a random enemy. This effect Grows by 2. Whenever you play a Wither card, apply !M! Poison to a random enemy. This effect Withers by !StSShapeShifter:Wither!.

StSShapeShifter:BladeOfGrass.NAME: Blade of Grass
StSShapeShifter:BladeOfGrass.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are Blossoming, Grow 8. If you are Blooming, Grow 4. Otherwise, Grow 2.
StSShapeShifter:BladeOfGrass.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are Blossoming, Grow 12. If you are Blooming, Grow 6. Otherwise, Grow 3.

StSShapeShifter:SunflowerShuriken.NAME: Sunflower Shuriken
StSShapeShifter:SunflowerShuriken.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are Decaying, set this card's damage to 16. If you are Wilting, Reset this card's damage. Otherwise, Wither !StSShapeShifter:Wither!.
StSShapeShifter:SunflowerShuriken.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If you are Decaying, set this card's damage to 20. If you are Wilting, Reset this card's damage. Otherwise, Wither !StSShapeShifter:Wither!.

StSShapeShifter:ClimbTree.NAME: Climb Tree
StSShapeShifter:ClimbTree.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you are Balanced, gain !M! Dodge. If you are are Wilting, add Falling Leaves to your hand. If you are Blooming, add a random Fruit to your hand.
StSShapeShifter:ClimbTree.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If you are Balanced, gain !M! Dodge and 4 additional Block. If you are are Wilting, add an Upgraded Falling Leaves to your hand. If you are Blooming, add 2 of a random Fruit to your hand.

StSShapeShifter:BurstOfLife.NAME: Burst of Life
StSShapeShifter:BurstOfLife.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your Bloom Count is more than 0. Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. Damage is equivalent to your Bloom Count. Reset your Bloom Count to 0.

StSShapeShifter:BurstOfLifeEscapeDeath.NAME: Burst of Life/Death
StSShapeShifter:BurstOfLifeEscapeDeath.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your Bloom Count is NOT 0. If your Bloom Count is greater than 0, Deal !D! Damage to all enemies. If your Bloom Count is less than 0, Gain !B! Block. Damage/Block is equivalent to your Bloom/Wilt Count. Reset your Bloom Count to 0.

StSShapeShifter:EscapeDeath.NAME: Escape Death
StSShapeShifter:EscapeDeath.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played if your Bloom Count is less than 0. Gain !B! Block. Block is equivalent to your Wilt Count. Reset your Bloom Count to 0.

StSShapeShifter:Vengeance.NAME: Vengeance
StSShapeShifter:Vengeance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. Damage is increased by the amount of damage you have received this combat. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:Forgiveness.NAME: Forgiveness
StSShapeShifter:Forgiveness.DESCRIPTION: Heal for !M!. Heal is increased by 30 percent of the damage you have received this combat. Exhaust.
StSShapeShifter:Forgiveness.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Heal for !M!. Heal is equivalent to 50 percent of the damage you have received this combat. Exhaust.

StSShapeShifter:Rabid.NAME: Rabid
StSShapeShifter:Rabid.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a form, deal !M! Damage to a random enemy.

StSShapeShifter:Garden.NAME: Garden
StSShapeShifter:Garden.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are Balanced, add a random Fruit to your hand. If you are Blooming, gain 1 energy. If you are Wilting, add a Rotten Fruit to your hand.
StSShapeShifter:Garden.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, if you are Balanced, add 2 random fruits to your hand. If you are Blooming, gain 1 energy and draw 1 card. If you are Wilting, add 2 Rotten Fruit to your hand.

StSShapeShifter:EmbraceTheCycle.NAME: Embrace the Cycle
StSShapeShifter:EmbraceTheCycle.DESCRIPTION: If you are Wilting, Attacks cost 1 less. If you are Balanced, Powers cost 1 less. If you are Blooming, Skills cost 1 less. Occurs when cards are drawn.

StSShapeShifter:Spring.NAME: Spring
StSShapeShifter:Spring.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Grow card, increase its Grow value by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:Summer.NAME: Summer
StSShapeShifter:Summer.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Grow card, double its Grow value.

StSShapeShifter:Autumn.NAME: Autumn
StSShapeShifter:Autumn.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a Wither card, draw !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! cards. Whenever you draw a Wither card, increase its Wither value by !M!.

StSShapeShifter:Winter.NAME: Winter
StSShapeShifter:Winter.DESCRIPTION: Your Wither cards cost 1 less. Whenever you draw a Wither Card, double its Wither value.
StSShapeShifter:Winter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Your Wither cards cost 0. Whenever you draw a Wither Card, double its Wither value.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
StSShapeShifter:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
StSShapeShifter:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
StSShapeShifter:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
StSShapeShifter:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

StSShapeShifter:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.NAME: Special Strike
StSShapeShifter:DefaultAttackWithVariabl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !StSShapeShifter:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

StSShapeShifter:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
StSShapeShifter:DefaultSecondMagicNumber.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !StSShapeShifter:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.
